title: Does the picture show a maneuver displayed in the face of Nazism?
subtitle: During the Hanukkah Festival in December 2019, social media users exchanged a powerful image from Germany in the 1930s.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A widely shared picture is a true picture of Hanukkah's maneuver presented at the home of a Jewish family in Nazi Germany in 1932.
